alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 8:16PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Charlotte and Lee Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 815 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Palmdale to near Muse to Pine Island Center. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Lehigh Acres, East Dunbar, Matlacha, Palmona Park, Southwest Florida Airport, Harlem Heights, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Iona, Cypress Lake, Pine Island Center, McGregor, Pine Manor, Charleston Park, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Olga, Pineland, Buckingham, and St. James City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
